LanguageData.Axi_AR_AK12_21CA.label: AK-12
LanguageData.Axi_AR_AK12_21CA.description: A modernized variant of the legendary AK-47, the AK-12 utilized contemporary materials and manufacturing techniques to produce a weapon that shares it's predecessor's reliability while reducing weight and improving ergonomics.
